metadata.description: SendGrid API key for the notification emails
Tags to be applied to the created resources
Optional. It is not recommended that you use prefix by azure you should be using a suffix for your resources.
Optional. It is recommended that you specify a suffix for consistency. Please use only lowercase characters when possible.
Optional. Custom seed value for the unique string to be created -defaults to resourceGroup Id.
Optional. Max length of the uniqueness suffix to be added -defaults to 4
Optional. Use dashes as separator where applicable -defaults to true
Optional. Create names using lowercase letters -defaults to true
Optional. Used when region abbreviation is needed (placeholder value is "**location**)

metadata.description: Stream Analytics Job Name, can contain alphanumeric characters and hypen and must be 3-63 characters long

properties.query:
SELECT
    System.TimeStamp() as AggregationTime,
    UserId,
    COUNT(*) AS eventCount,
    SUM(CAST(udf.parseJson(backendEventHub.EventPayload).amount as bigint)) as totalAmount
INTO
    evtHubSink
FROM
    backendEventHub TIMESTAMP BY [Timestamp]
WHERE Event='WITHDRAWAL'
GROUP BY UserId, TumblingWindow(second, 60)
